mapper.sql: id as id, seeding_collection_id as seedingCollectionId, sku_code as skuCode, sku_ext_code as skuExtCode, sku_bar_code as skuBarCode, sku_name as skuName, qty as qty, seeding_qty as seedingQty, customer_code as customerCode, customer_name as customerName, store_code as storeCode, store_name as storeName, inv_status as invStatus, inv_type as invType, batch_number as batchNumber, mfg_date as mfgDate, exp_date as expDate, country_of_origin as countryOfOrigin, inv_attr1 as invAttr1, inv_attr2 as invAttr2, inv_attr3 as invAttr3, inv_attr4 as invAttr4, inv_attr5 as invAttr5, uuid as uuid, ou_id as ouId, odo_id as odoId, odo_line_id as odoLineId, sku_id as skuId
mapper.update: UPDATE t_wh_seeding_collection_line SET sku_id = #{skuId,javaType=java.lang.Long,jdbcType=BIGINT} , seeding_collection_id = #{seedingCollectionId,javaType=java.lang.Long,jdbcType=BIGINT} , sku_code = #{skuCode,javaType=java.lang.String,jdbcType=VARCHAR} , sku_ext_code = #{skuExtCode,javaType=java.lang.String,jdbcType=VARCHAR} , sku_bar_code = #{skuBarCode,javaType=java.lang.String,jdbcType=VARCHAR} , sku_name = #{skuName,javaType=java.lang.String,jdbcType=VARCHAR} , qty = #{qty,javaType=Long,jdbcType=DECIMAL} , seeding_qty = #{seedingQty,javaType=Long,jdbcType=DECIMAL} , customer_code = #{customerCode,javaType=java.lang.String,jdbcType=VARCHAR} , customer_name = #{customerName,javaType=java.lang.String,jdbcType=VARCHAR} , store_code = #{storeCode,javaType=java.lang.String,jdbcType=VARCHAR} , store_name = #{storeName,javaType=java.lang.String,jdbcType=VARCHAR} , inv_status = #{invStatus,javaType=java.lang.String,jdbcType=VARCHAR} , inv_type = #{invType,javaType=java.lang.String,jdbcType=VARCHAR} , batch_number = #{batchNumber,javaType=java.lang.String,jdbcType=VARCHAR} , mfg_date = #{mfgDate,javaType=java.util.Date,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} , exp_date = #{expDate,javaType=java.util.Date,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} , country_of_origin = #{countryOfOrigin,javaType=java.lang.String,jdbcType=VARCHAR} , inv_attr1 = #{invAttr1,javaType=java.lang.String,jdbcType=VARCHAR} , inv_attr2 = #{invAttr2,javaType=java.lang.String,jdbcType=VARCHAR} , inv_attr3 = #{invAttr3,javaType=java.lang.String,jdbcType=VARCHAR} , inv_attr4 = #{invAttr4,javaType=java.lang.String,jdbcType=VARCHAR} , inv_attr5 = #{invAttr5,javaType=java.lang.String,jdbcType=VARCHAR} , uuid = #{uuid,javaType=java.lang.String,jdbcType=VARCHAR} , odo_id = #{odoId,javaType=java.lang.Long,jdbcType=BIGINT} , odo_line_id = #{odoLineId,javaType=java.lang.Long,jdbcType=BIGINT} WHERE id = #{id} and ou_id = #{ouId}
mapper.select: select collectionLine.id as id, collectionLine.seeding_collection_id as seedingCollectionId, collectionLine.sku_code as skuCode, collectionLine.sku_ext_code as skuExtCode, collectionLine.sku_bar_code as skuBarCode, collectionLine.sku_name as skuName, collectionLine.qty as qty, collectionLine.seeding_qty as seedingQty, collectionLine.customer_code as customerCode, collectionLine.customer_name as customerName, collectionLine.store_code as storeCode, collectionLine.store_name as storeName, collectionLine.inv_status as invStatus, collectionLine.inv_type as invType, collectionLine.batch_number as batchNumber, collectionLine.mfg_date as mfgDate, collectionLine.exp_date as expDate, collectionLine.country_of_origin as countryOfOrigin, collectionLine.inv_attr1 as invAttr1, collectionLine.inv_attr2 as invAttr2, collectionLine.inv_attr3 as invAttr3, collectionLine.inv_attr4 as invAttr4, collectionLine.inv_attr5 as invAttr5, collectionLine.uuid as uuid, collectionLine.ou_id as ouId, collectionLine.odo_id as odoId, collectionLine.odo_line_id as odoLineId, collectionLine.sku_id as skuId, store.id as storeId, customer.id as customerId, odo.odo_code as odoCode from t_wh_seeding_collection_line as collectionLine left join t_wh_odo as odo on collectionLine.odo_id = odo.id left join t_bi_customer as customer on customer.customer_code = collectionLine.customer_code and customer.customer_name = collectionLine.customer_name left join t_bi_store as store on store.store_code = collectionLine.store_code and store.store_name = collectionLine.store_name where collectionLine.seeding_collection_id = #{seedingCollectionId} and collectionLine.ou_id = #{ouId}
